Description: Qassim Cement is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. It operates within the Materials sector focusing on Construction Materials. It has one subsidiary operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Construction Materials. QACCO is based in Buraydah, Saudi Arabia and was established in August 1976.
